quotes: You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.
Is it really possible to tell someone else what one feels?
Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
I am who I am today because of the choices I made yesterday.
Beware of false knowledge, it is more dangerous than ignorance.
If you focus on results and finding shortcuts, you'll get impatient. If you focus on the process and doing the right thing, you'll be unstoppable.
I would rather be a little nobody, then to be an evil somebody.
Never do to others what you would not like them to do to you.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right ? for you'll be criticized anyway.
Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
As a man thinketh in his heart, so shall he be.
I would rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I'm not.
The most virtuous are those who content themselves with being virtuous without seeking to appear so.
The truth is simple. If it was complicated, everyone would understand it.
If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.
Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
Life is like stepping onto a boat which is about to sail out to sea and sink.
Leadership starts at the top.
Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.
One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries.
I thought how unpleasant it is to be locked out; and I thought how it is worse, perhaps, to be locked in.
Life is one long process of getting tired.
Help others for all the times that you have been ignored. Be kind to others, for all the times that you have been scorned.
The friendship that can cease has never been real.
You don't know who is important to you until you actually lose them.
Enthusiasm is a vital element toward the individual success of every man or woman.
For all evils there are two remedies - time and silence.
A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.
Tradition is the illusion of permanence.
It is those who concentrate on but one thing at a time who advance in this world.
Don't Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
Always focus on the front windshield and not the rear view mirror.
Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
The highest level of wisdom is when you not only accept but love adversity.
It is what we make out of what we have, not what we are given, that separates one person from another.
The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.
Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
Reversing your treatment of the man you have wronged is better than asking his forgiveness.
The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
How much pain they have cost us, the evils which have never happened.
Don't change your mind just because people are offended; change your mind if you're wrong.
However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
We cannot expect to be happy always... by experiencing evil as well as good we become wise.
The very essence of instinct is that it's followed independently of reason.
Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
Have the fearless attitude of a hero and the loving heart of a child.
